bill_title: require the provision of insurance coverage for the entire human musculoskeletal system of the jaw, face, and head under certain circumstances.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the provision of insurance coverage for the entire human musculoskeletal system of the jaw, face, and head under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 58-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any health benefit plan as defined by § 58-17-63 that provides coverage for treatment involving the bones or joints of the human musculoskeletal system shall also provide the same coverage for treatment of the bones, joints, and musculoskeletal system of the jaw, face, and head. Section 2. That chapter 58-18 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any health benefit plan as defined by § 58-18-42 that provides coverage for treatment involving the bones or joints of the human musculoskeletal system shall also provide the same coverage for treatment of the bones, joints, and musculoskeletal system of the jaw, face, and head.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
